test.name: sum_aggregation_comparison
test.query: SELECT sum(RedirectCount), sum(RedirectCount BY UserID % {group_scale}), sum(RedirectCount TOTALS) FROM test.hits GROUP BY CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale} FORMAT Null
SELECT DISTINCT sum(RedirectCount) OVER (PARTITION BY CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale}), sum(RedirectCount) OVER (PARTITION BY UserID), sum(RedirectCount) OVER () FROM test.hits FORMAT Null
SELECT sum(RedirectCount) FROM test.hits GROUP BY GROUPING SETS((CounterID % 13, UserID % {group_scale}), (CounterID % 13),()) FORMAT Null
